Mobster stood still. The raptor would have to move sometime.

Mobster (Horn=
 Drill voice): He'll have to move sometime. Who helped to build this house?=


Mobster kept his cannon aimed at Razorclaw, waiting and watching...
  ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  =
Sent: Saturday, December 23, 2000 12:48 PM
  Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice

=

  Razor Claw knew that there was only one way to survive a blast from a we=
apon of that size. he transformed to Raptor mode and used full strength on =
his shield. The ground around him incinerated on contact. He survived but i=
t was sapping to much of his strength. The raptor couldn't move without dea=
ctivating his shield.
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: SOULSTICE=
 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, December 22, 2000 10:04 AM
=
    Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


    Mobster took a scratch of damage, st=
ill looking down at Razorclaw. Mobster aimed his giant cannon at Razorclaw =
and fired...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
  =
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, December 22, 2000 7:01 AM
 =
     Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


      Razor Claw stood confused for the=
 moment, he tried to show no weakness. He stepped forward and hurled his sw=
ord at Mobster. "Is this supposed to impress me?" he asked looking up at th=
e bot he challenged. 
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: S=
OULSTICE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Thursday, December =
21, 2000 10:50 AM
        Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


        Gigas didn=
't move an inch, seeing as how Mobster was in his place now.

        Gigas=
: How about this, I crush you, as Mobster, I crush you, as Gigas, it'll wor=
k 2 ways.

        Mobster switches voices.

        Kracken: But right now=
, we're Mobster...
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: =
CYBERWOLF4 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Thursday, Dec=
ember 21, 2000 10:15 AM
          Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


          =
Razor Claw looked up at his attacker still showing no fear, "That sounds li=
ke a challenge, Let's make this interesting, you knock me down, I join your=
 alliance, I knock you down, you surrender to the Maximals, deal?" he stepp=
ed forward, pulled his left arm back and threw an upprcut into Gigas' stoma=
ch. "I'll go first."
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            =
From: SOULSTICE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Wedn=
esday, December 20, 2000 12:18 PM
            Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice
=


            Gigas: Oh, hohohohoho, I love an unfair fight. That wasn't my=
 best shot, but I didn't want to waste anything on you. In other words, I a=
m not intimidated. I have seen battles come and go, me taking the brunt of =
the attack, but i still stand, I still walk, I still fight. You know, you s=
hould join the Alliance, it would do you a world of good.

            Giga=
s stayed planted to his spot, not moving an inch...
              ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
              From: CYBERWOLF4 
              To: nbwr=
pg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 10:20 AM
 =
             Subject: Sorry soulstice


              Sorry, it must've bee=
n mixxed up in the battle. I found it.

              claw struck him, but =
Gigas didn't move. Beholder 2 and Grenade are both bowled over by the energ=
y ball. Horn Drill jumps in the air and backflips, happy that he again came=
 through for the Mini-Mafia. Gigas looks down at Razorclaw. (Judging by the=
 size of the Razorclaw figure and the fact that Gigas is a large, Ultra siz=
ed bot, like Depth Charge) Gigas swings a huge punch at Razorclaw

        =
      Razor Claws head snapped back from Gigas' punch.  The punch hurt like=
 hell but Razor Claw wouldn't show pain. The impact caused the Raptor to be=
 knocked back about ten feet but he stayed on his feat. He looked back  at =
the attacker and couldn't hold back a snarl. "I hope that wasn't your best =
shot, I'd hate to have to eliminate you in an unfair fight".
              =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: THECODE 
            =
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 200=
0 6:13 PM
                Subject: Re: three on one hardly seems fair, mayb=
e the three should get help.


                OOC: Hey, Gigas punched at R=
azorclaw, post damage...
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
                From: CYBERWOLF4 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

                  Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 10:31 AM
              =
    Subject: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe the three should get hel=
p.


                  Razor Claw saw the three bots leaving the sceen of t=
he battle and mistook them for escaping alliance members. he mentally repor=
ted his actions to Ice and got the go ahead. He chased the three until they=
 were out of the way of the fight. He transformed to robot mode, pulled his=
 sword and confronted them. "You will stop or you will be forced to, your c=
hoice."

                  He aproached the three bots ready for battle and=
 hoping that things won't be ended peacefully.
                    ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
                    From: dachande 
                 =
   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    Sent: Monday, December 18, 2=
000 7:40 PM
                    Subject: Eclipse, Wolveritron, and Ramus


=
                    ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::
                     
   =
                     They had heard the battling and decided to run away, t=
hey needed no part in the conflict. Eclipse and Wolveritron ran into Ramus =
as they were leaving, and togther they exited the base, in beast modes. And=
 headed far away.














          eGroups Sponsor
